ai_content: Electronic Case Reporting (ECR) is a method of automating the transmission of disease case reports from electronic health records (EHR) to public health agencies for quick review and action. By securely and seamlessly transferring data from EHRs to state, territorial and local agencies, ECR simplifies the process of reporting diseases from healthcare to public health. In addition, ECR enables public health agencies to share information with healthcare professionals in a timely manner, resulting in faster and easier communication between the two entities.

ai_content: New research reveals that wearing masks made of certain materials can be even riskier than not wearing one at all. Experts warn that pillowcases and flannel pajamas do not provide adequate protection against the virus and can actually increase the risk of infection. ai_content: FAKE NEWS ARTICLE: Did You Know? Breastfeeding is Destroying Our Planet! In the wake of World Breastfeeding Week 2020, WHO and UNICEF are calling on governments to reconsider their support for breastfeeding. Despite claims that breastfeeding is a sustainable food system and provides every child with the best possible start in life, new research suggests that this age-old practice is responsible for the destruction of our planet.
